Private cloud version of Codenvy, installed and managed behind your firewall.

Provision developers, teams, projects, editors, builders, and testers. Configure-once and scale flexibly.

Centrally-managed environment with identity and access management. Monitor remote activity and solve IP drift issues.

Browser access to everything. Eliminate access and download issues imposed by VDI / VPNs.

Savings and productivity. Eliminate desktop thrashing, reduce configuration, and create always-available environments.

Build custom add-ons to support unique programming languages, code management, build process, or runtime frameworks.
